original_text: Then the Lord said to me, “Throw it to the potter”—the lordly price at which I was priced by them. So I took the thirty pieces of silver and threw them into the house of the Lord, to the potter.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 그들이 나를 헤아린 바 그 삯을 토기장이에게 던지라 하시기로 내가 곧 그 은 삼십 개를 여호와의 전에서 토기장이에게 던지고

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to me,
the lordly price at which I was priced by them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 값 매긴 그 존귀한 가격이라.

sentences.original_text: So I took the thirty pieces of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 내가 은 삼십 개를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and threw them into the house of the Lord, to the potter.
